title: [创世|管理|传送]Multiverse-Core —— 多世界Build#725最新汉化[1.10-1.4.5]
author: CatSeed
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-17 06:55 编辑 

友情提示：本帖不是站内二转只是汉化了最新版本的Multiverse-Core（当前Build#725）而原帖的汉化最新版为 Build#677

详情介绍请前往wolski大大的帖子
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-101532-1-1.html



zh-CN中文本  en-US英文原Build#725
zh-CN中文版  en-US英文原Build#722

zh-CN中文版 兼容性未知 自行测试

申明：本次汉化的语言文件直接引用了wolski前辈的，如有冒犯，敬请原谅
  @wolski  

汉化信息公开：
[AnchorCommand.class]
Create, Delete and Manage Anchor Destinations.=创建, 删除, 管理锚点 (传送点).
{name}={名字}
Allows a player to list all anchors.=允许玩家列出所有锚点.
Allows a player to create anchors.=允许玩家创建锚点.
Allows a player to delete anchors.=允许玩家删除锚点.
You don't have the permission to list anchors!=你没有权限查看锚点!
====[ Multiverse Anchor List ]=========[ Multiverse 锚点列表 ]====
Sorry...=抱歉... 
No anchors matched your filter:=没有锚点匹配关键词: 
No anchors were defined.=无被定义的锚点.
Page= 页数 
of= / 
You don't have the permission to delete anchors!=你没有权限删除锚点!
Anchor '=锚点 '
' was successfully=' 已成功 
deleted!=删除!
You must be a player to create Anchors.=只有游戏中的玩家才能创建锚点.
You don't have the permission to create anchors!=你没有权限创建锚点!
created!=创建!
[CheckCommand.class]
Help you validate your multiverse settings=帮助你检验 multiverse 设置
{PLAYER} {DESTINATION}={玩家} {目的地}
Checks to see if a player can go to a destination. Prints debug if false.=检查玩家能否去该目的地. 如果不能则报告相关信息.
Could not find player=无法找到玩家 
Are they online?=他们在线吗?
[CloneCommand.class]
Clone World=克隆世界
{TARGET} {NAME}= {目标} {名字}
-g [GENERATOR[:ID]]= -g [生成器[:ID]]
To clone a world that uses a generator:=克隆世界所用的生成器:
Clones a world.=克隆一个世界
Sorry, Multiverse doesn't know about world=抱歉, Multiverse 不了解世界 
, so we can't clone it!=, 所以不能克隆它!
Check the=使用 
command to verify it is listed.= 指令以确认它是否在列表内
World Cloned!=世界已克隆!
World could NOT be cloned!=世界不能被克隆!
[ConfigCommand.class]
Configuration=设置
{PROPERTY} {VALUE}={项目} {变量}
Allows you to set Global MV Variables.=允许你设置全局变量
%sSetting '%s' to '%s' failed!=%s设置 '%s' 为 '%s' 时失败!
SUCCESS!=完成!
Values were updated successfully!= 设置值已成功更新!
FAIL!=失败!
Check your console for details!= 查看控制台内的详细信息!
[ConfirmCommand.class]
Confirms a command that could destroy life, the universe and everything.=确认使用该指令, 该指令可能会危及到生命, 世界或其他的东西
If you have not been prompted to use this, it will not do anything.=如果你没有被提示使用它, 它不会做任何事情.
[CoordCommand.class]
Returns detailed information on the Players where abouts.=显示当前玩家所在位置详细信息
--- Location Information ---=--- 坐标信息 ---
World:=世界: 
Alias:=别名: 
World Scale:=世界比例: 
Coordinates:=坐标: 
Direction:=朝向: 
Block:=方块: 
This command needs to be used from a Player.=这个指令只能是玩家使用
[CreateCommand.class]
Create World=创建世界
/mv create %s{NAME} {ENV} %s-s [SEED] -g [GENERATOR[:ID]] -t [WORLDTYPE] [-n] -a [true|false]=/mv create %s{名字} {环境} %s-s [种子] -g [生成器[:ID]] -t [生成器] [-n] -a [true|false]
Creates a new world and loads it.=创建一个新世界并加载
Multiverse cannot create=Multiverse 无法创建, 
another=已有世界
world named= 叫那个名字: 
A Folder/World already exists with this name!=已有那个名字的文件夹/世界存在!
If you are confident it is a world you can import with /mvimport=如果你确定这个世界能转换, 请使用 /mvimport
That is not a valid environment.=那是一个无效环境
That is not a valid World Type.=那是一个无效世界类型
Invalid generator! '=无效生成器! '
Aborting world creation.=取消世界生成
Starting creation of world '=开始生成世界 '
Complete!=完成!
FAILED.=失败.
[DebugCommand.class]
Turn Debug on/off?=切换调试模式?
Spams the console a bunch.=在控制台显示调试信息
Error=错误
setting debug level. Please use a number 0-3= 调试等级. 请使用数字 0-3 
Multiverse Debug mode is=Multiverse 调试模式是 
OFF=关闭的
Multiverse Debug ENABLED=Multiverse 调试模式开启
[DeleteCommand.class]
Delete World=删除世界
{WORLD}= {世界}
Deletes a world on your server.=删除服务器内的世界 
PERMANENTLY.=永久.
World Deleted!=世界已删除!
World could NOT be deleted!=世界不能被删除!
[EnvironmentCommand.class]
List Environments=环境列表
Lists valid known environments/world types.=列出可用已知环境/世界类型
Valid Environments are:=可用环境:
Valid World Types are:=可用世界类型:
[GeneratorCommand.class]
World Information=世界生成器信息
Returns a list of Loaded Generator Plugins.=列出生成器插件
PLEASE IGNORE the 'Plugin X does not contain any generators' message below!=请无视下面 '插件 X 不包含任何生成器' 的信息!
--- Loaded Generator Plugins ---=--- 已加载的生成器插件 ---
No Generator Plugins found.=没有发现生成器插件
[HelpCommand.class]
Get Help with Multiverse=获取 Multiverse 帮助
Displays a nice help menu.=显示帮助菜单
====[ Multiverse Help ]=========[ Multiverse 帮助 ]====
Sorry...=抱歉... 
No commands matched your filter:=没有找到匹配关键词的指令: 
Add a '=添加一个 '
' after a command to see more about it.=' 于一个指令之后来查看更多信息.
Page=页数 
of= / 
[FILTER] [PAGE #]=[关键词] [页数 #]
[ImportCommand.class]
Import World=转换世界
{NAME} {ENV}= {名字} {环境}
-g [GENERATOR[:ID]] [-n]= -g [生成器[:ID]] [-n]
To import a world that uses a generator, you'll need the generator:=转换那种世界, 你需要生成器:
Imports a new world of the specified type.=转换一个世界为指定类型
====[ These look like worlds ]=========[ 可能潜在的世界 ]====
No potential worlds found. Sorry!=没有发现潜在可能的世界!
already knows about '= 已了解那个世界的环境 '
That is not a valid environment.=那不是一个有效的环境类型.
Starting import of world '%s'...=开始转换世界 '%s'...
Complete!=完成!
Failed!=失败!
FAILED.=失败.
That world environment did not exist.=那个世界的环境不存在.
For a list of available world types, type:=查看有效世界类型列表, 输入: 
That world folder does not exist. These look like worlds to me:=那个世界的文件夹不存在. 以下是可能的世界:
[InfoCommand.class]
world=世界名
World Information=世界信息
Returns detailed information on the world.=列出世界的详细信息
You must enter a=你必须输入一个指定的
from the console!= 在控制台!
That world exists, but it is unloaded!=那个世界已存在, 但是没有被加载!
You can load it with: %s/mv load %s=你可以使用该指令加载: %s/mv load %s
That world does not exist.=世界不存在
That world exists, but Multiverse does not know about it!=那个世界存在, 但是 Multiverse 无法解读它!
You can import it with=你可以使用转换指令
{ENV}={环境}
For available environments type=将其转换为一个有效环境 
General Info=综合信息
World Name:=世界名: 
World Alias:=世界别名: 
Game Mode:=游戏模式: 
Difficulty:=难度: 
Spawn Location:=出生点: 
World Scale:=世界比例: 
Price to enter this world:=进入该世界的价格: 
FREE!=免费!
Players will respawn in:=玩家将在该点出生: 
!!INVALID!!=!!无效!!
More World Settings=更多世界设置
World Type:=世界类型: 
Structures:=建造: 
Weather:=天气: 
Players will get hungry:=玩家将会饥饿: 
Keep spawn in memory:=保持出生记忆: 
PVP Settings=PVP 设置
Multiverse Setting:=Multiverse 设置: 
Bukkit Setting:=Bukkit 设置: 
Monster Settings=Monster 设置
Monsters that=该世界
CAN NOT= 不可生成 
spawn:=怪物: 
CAN SPAWN:= 可生成: 
Monsters that CAN spawn:=可生成的怪物: 
ALL=全部
NONE=无
Animal Settings=动物设置
Animals that=动物
Animals that CAN spawn:=可生成的动物: 
of= / 
[ Page= [ 页数 
[ListCommand.class]
World Listing=世界列表
Displays a listing of all worlds that you can enter.=显示所以你能进入的世界
====[ Multiverse World List ]=========[ Multiverse 世界列表 ]====
Sorry...=抱歉... 
No worlds matched your filter:=没找到匹配该关键词的世界: 
Page=页数 
of= / 
[LoadCommand.class]
Load World=加载世界
{WORLD}= {世界}
Loads a world into Multiverse.=加载世界到 Multiverse.
Loaded world '=已加载世界 '
Error trying to load world '=加载该世界时发生错误 '
[ModifyAddCommand.class]
Modify a World (Add a value)=修改世界 (附加一个值)
add {VALUE} {PROPERTY}=add {值} {设置}
Modify various aspects of worlds. See the help wiki for how to use this command properly. If you do not include a world, the current world will be used.=修改世界各个方面的设置. 查看 wiki 学习如何正确使用指令. 如果你没有写入世界名, 当前世界会使用该设置.
From the console, WORLD is required.=本指令在控制台执行时, 世界处 必填.
Nothing changed.=没有变更
That world does not exist!=那个世界不存在!
Sorry, you can't ADD to=抱歉, 你不能增加 
Please visit our Github Wiki for more information: http://goo.gl/4W8cY=请访问 Github Wiki 查看更多信息: http://goo.gl/4W8cY
Success!=成功! 
was= 已 
added to=添加 
There was an issue saving worlds.yml!  Your changes will only be temporary!=保存worlds.yml时发生错误!  你所做的变更只是临时的!
could not be added to= 不能增加 
[ModifyClearCommand.class]
Modify a World (Clear a property)=修改世界 (清除设置)
clear {PROPERTY}= clear {设置}
Removes all values from a property. This will work on properties that contain lists.=移除所有设置的值. 设置将在所有包含的列表里生效.
From the console, WORLD is required.=本指令在控制台执行时, 世界处 必填.
Nothing changed.=没有变更
That world does not exist!=那个世界不存在!
Sorry, you can't use CLEAR with=抱歉, 你不能使用清除指令 
Please visit our Github Wiki for more information: http://goo.gl/cgB2B=请访问 Github Wiki 查看更多信息: http://goo.gl/cgB2B
was cleared. It contains 0 values now.= 已清除. 现在它不包含任何值.
Success!=成功! 
was= 已 
CLEARED=清除
. It contains=. 它现在包含 
values now.= 个值.
There was an issue saving worlds.yml!  Your changes will only be temporary!=保存worlds.yml时发生错误!  你所做的变更只是临时的!
Error:=错误: 
NOT=没有
cleared.= 清除.
[ModifyCommand.class]
Modify a World=修改世界
{set|add|remove|clear} ...= {set设置|add添加|remove移除|clear清除} ...
Modify various aspects of worlds. It requires add/set/clear/remove. See the examples below=修改世界各个方面的设置. 需要set设/add添加/remove移除/clear清除. 查看以下示例
[ModifyRemoveCommand.class]
Modify a World (Remove a value)=修改世界 (移除一个值)
remove {PROPERTY} {VALUE}= remove {设置} {值}
Modify various aspects of worlds. See the help wiki for how to use this command properly. If you do not include a world, the current world will be used.=修改世界各个方面的设置. 查看 wiki 学习如何正确使用指令. 如果你没有写入世界名, 当前世界会使用该设置.
From the console, WORLD is required.=本指令在控制台执行时, 世界处 必填.
Nothing changed.=没有变更
That world does not exist!=那个世界不存在!
Sorry, you can't REMOVE anything from=抱歉, 你不能移除
Please visit our Github Wiki for more information: http://goo.gl/4W8cY=请访问 Github Wiki 查看更多信息: http://goo.gl/4W8cY
Success!=成功! 
removed from=移除 
There was an issue saving worlds.yml!  Your changes will only be temporary!=保存worlds.yml时发生错误!  你所做的变更只是临时的!
There was an error removing=移除时发生错误 
[ModifySetCommand.class]
Modify a World (Set a value)=修改世界 (设置一个值)
set {PROPERTY} {VALUE}= set {设置} {值}
spawn=出生点
Modify various aspects of worlds. See the help wiki for how to use this command properly. If you do not include a world, the current world will be used.=修改世界各个方面的设置. 查看 wiki 学习如何正确使用指令. 如果你没有写入世界名, 当前世界会使用该设置.
You must be a player to set the=你必须是游戏中的玩家来设置
Spawn is the only param with no=出生点不需要设置值
Type=输入 
For help.= 查看帮助信息.
From the command line, WORLD is required.=本指令在控制台执行时, 世界处 必填.
Nothing changed.=没有变更
That world does not exist!=那个世界不存在!
is not a valid color. Please pick one of the following:= 不是一个有效的颜色. 请在以下示例中选择:
Success!=成功!
Property= 属性 
was set to= 已设置为 
There was an issue saving worlds.yml!  Your changes will only be temporary!=保存worlds.yml时发生错误!  你所做的变更只是临时的!
Sorry, You can't set: '=抱歉, 你不能设置: '
Valid world-properties:=有效的世界属性: 
[PurgeCommand.class]
Purge World of Creatures=清除世界的生物
{all|animals|monsters|MOBNAME}={all全部|animals动物|monsters敌对怪物|生物名}
Removed the specified type of mob from the specified world.=从指定世界清除掉指定类型的生物.
This command requires a WORLD when being run from the console!=在控制台运行此指令时需要填写指定世界名!
It cannot be purged.=它不能被清除.
[RegenCommand.class]
Regenerates a World=重生一个世界
{WORLD}= {世界}
You can use the -s with no args to get a new seed:=你可以使用 -s 不附带种子码来获取一个新的种子码:
or specifiy a seed to get that one:=或指定一个种子码:
Regenerates a world on your server. The previous state will be lost=给你的服务器重新生成一个世界. 之前的东西将会丢失 
PERMANENTLY.=永久地!
World Regenerated!=世界已重生!
World could NOT be regenerated!=世界不能重生!
[ReloadCommand.class]
Reload Configs=重载配置
Reloads worlds.yml and config.yml.=重载 worlds.yml 和 config.yml.
Reloading all Multiverse Plugin configs...=正在重载所有 Multiverse 配置...
Reload Complete!=重载完成!
[RemoveCommand.class]
Remove World=移除世界
{WORLD}= {世界}
Unloads a world from Multiverse and removes it from worlds.yml, this does NOT DELETE the world folder.=从 Multiverse 中卸载一个世界并移除worlds.yml内相应世界信息, 这个指令不会删除该世界文件夹.
World removed from config!=世界已从配置文件中移除!
Error trying to remove world from config!=从配置文件中移除该世界时发生错误!
[ScriptCommand.class]
Runs a script.=运行一个脚本
{script} [target]= {脚本} [目标]
That script file does not exist in the Multiverse-Core scripts directory!=那个脚本不在 Multiverse-Core 的scripts目录里!
Script '%s%s%s' finished!=脚本 '%s%s%s' 已完成!
[SetSpawnCommand.class]
Set World Spawn=设置世界出生点
Sets the spawn for the current world.=为当前世界设置出生点.
It looks like that location would normally be unsafe. But I trust you.=看起来所在位置不太安全. 但是我相信你.
I'm turning off the Safe-T-Teleporter for spawns to this world.=正在为这个世界出生点关闭安全传送.
If you want this turned back on just do:=如果你想复原只需这样做:
Spawn was set to:=出生点已设置为: 
There was an issue saving worlds.yml!  Your changes will only be temporary!=保存worlds.yml时发生错误!  你所做的变更只是临时的!
Multiverse does not know about this world, only X,Y and Z set. Please import it to set the spawn fully (Pitch/Yaws).=Multiverse 不了解这个世界, 只有 X,Y 和 Z 设置. 请转换它以便接下来设置出生点 (Pitch/Yaws).
You cannot use this command from the console.=你不能在控制台使用这条指令.
[SilentCommand.class]
Turn silent mode on/off?=切换沉默模式 开/关?
Reduces the amount of startup messages.=减少服务器启动时的信息量.
Multiverse Silent Start mode is=Multiverse 沉默启动模式 
ON=开
OFF=关
[SleepCommand.class]
Go to Sleep=去睡觉
Takes you the latest bed you've slept in (Currently BROKEN).=把你带到上次睡觉的床睡觉 (当前不可用).
[SpawnCommand.class]
Teleports another player to the spawn of the world they are in.=传送玩家到所在世界的出生点.
Spawn=出生点
Teleports you to the Spawn Point of the world you are in.=传送你到所在世界的出生点.
You don't have permission to teleport another player to spawn. (multiverse.core.spawn.other)=你没有权限把其他玩家送到出生点. (需要权限 multiverse.core.spawn.other)
Teleporting to this world's spawn...=正在传送到这个世界的出生点...
You were teleported by:=你被他传送: 
the console=控制台
is not logged on right now!= 现在没有在登入状态!
You don't have permission to teleport yourself to spawn. (multiverse.core.spawn.self)=你没有权限把自己送到出生点. (需要权限 multiverse.core.spawn.self)
From the console, you must provide a PLAYER.=你必须是游戏中的玩家才能使用此指令.
[TeleportCommand.class]
Teleport=传送
{WORLD}= {世界}
Sorry, I couldn't find player: %s%s=抱歉, 没有发现玩家: %s%s
From the console, you must specify a player to teleport=在控制台使用此指令时, 你必须指定一个玩家来传送
Multiverse does not know how to take you to %s%s=Multiverse 不知道如何带你去 %s%s
Doesn't look like you're allowed to go=你不能去 
there...=那里...
Doesn't look like you're allowed to send=你不能被传送 
to= 到 
DOH! Doesn't look like you can get to %s%s %sfrom where you are...=看起来你不能去 %s%s %s从你所在的位置...
DOH! Doesn't look like %s%s %scan get to %sTHERE from where they are...=看起来 %s%s %s不能去 %s从他们所在的位置...
Sorry you don't have permission to go to the world spawn!=你没有权限传送到出生点!
Sorry you don't have permission to send %s to the world spawn!=你没有权限将 %s 送至出生点!
Sorry Boss, I tried everything, but just couldn't teleport ya there!=抱歉老大, 没法传送到那里!
[UnloadCommand.class]
Unload World=卸载世界
{WORLD}= {世界}
Unloads a world from Multiverse. This does NOT remove the world folder. This does NOT remove it from the config file.=从 Multiverse 中卸载一个世界. 这个指令不会删除该世界文件夹. 也不会删除config配置文件内的世界信息.
Unloaded world '=卸载世界 '
Error trying to unload world '=卸载时发生错误 '
[VersionCommand$1.class]
Version info dumped here:=版本信息发送至: 
Version info dumped here: %s=版本信息发送至: %s
[VersionCommand.class]
Multiverse Version=Multiverse 版本信息
-[pb]=-[p或b]
Dumps version info to the console, optionally to pastie.org with -p or pastebin.com with a -b.=已发送版本信息到控制台, 添加后缀-p 发送至 pastie.org, 添加后缀-b 发送至pastebin.com
Version info dumped to console. Please check your server logs.=版本信息已经发送至控制台. 请查看你的服务器日志.

[Multiverse-Core]  worldnameprefix:=[Multiverse-Core]  世界名前缀: 
[Multiverse-Core]  teleportcooldown:=[Multiverse-Core]  传送冷却时间: 
[Multiverse-Core]  messagecooldown:=[Multiverse-Core]  消息冷却时间: 
[Multiverse-Core] Dumping Config Values: (version=[Multiverse-Core] 导出配置数值: (version 
[Multiverse-Core] Permissions Plugin:=[Multiverse-Core] 权限插件:

[Multiverse-Core] Loaded Worlds:=[Multiverse-Core] 加载世界: 
[Multiverse-Core] Bukkit Version:=[Multiverse-Core] 服务器版本: 
[Multiverse-Core] Multiverse-Core Version:=[Multiverse-Core] Multiverse-Core 版本: 
[WhoCommand.class]
Who?=谁在那里?
States who is in what world.=查看指定世界有哪些玩家.
That world does not exist.=世界不存在.
--- Worlds and their players ---=--- 世界&玩家 --- 
No worlds found.=没有发现世界
No players found.=没有发现玩家
[Command.class]
Permission:=权限: 
Aliases:=别名: 
Examples:=示例:
[CommandHandler.class]
The command=指令 
has been halted due to the fact that it could break something!= 被停止执行是由于它可能会破坏某些东西!
If you still wish to execute=如果你执意要执行 
please type:=请输入: 
will only be available for= 只在 
seconds.= 秒内有效.

replies.author: a1486077529
replies.txt_content: 来来 问个问题 如何关闭世界动物/怪物生成

replies.author: CatSeed
replies.txt_content:
a1486077529 发表于 2015-10-4 23:59
来来 问个问题 如何关闭世界动物/怪物生成
配置文件里面
    spawning:
      ==: MVSpawnSettings
      animals:
        ==: MVSpawnSubSettings
        spawn: 'true'
        spawnrate: '-1'
        exceptions: []
      monsters:
        ==: MVSpawnSubSettings
        spawn: 'true'
        spawnrate: '-1'
        exceptions: []复制代码
修改为
    spawning:
      ==: MVSpawnSettings
      animals:
        ==: MVSpawnSubSettings
        spawn: 'false'
        spawnrate: '-1'
        exceptions: []
      monsters:
        ==: MVSpawnSubSettings
        spawn: 'false'
        spawnrate: '-1'
        exceptions: []复制代码

即调整spawn项为false
